original_title: Bonitinha mas Ordinária ou Otto Lara Rezende
overview: The youngest daughter of a rich man has been raped by five black men in the slums of Rio de Janeiro, and her father arranges her marriage to one of his employees in order to save the family’s honor.
tagline: She's only 17 and she only knows how to love in a weird way
title: Bonitinha mas Ordinária ou Otto Lara Rezende
